title.narrative: CN-Jiangxi Poyang Lake Basin and Ecological Economic Zone Small Town Development Project

description.narrative: To improve key public services in participating small towns of Jiangxi Province through improvements to prioritized infrastructure

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I C, para 5 | Description :Borrower shall not amend, abrogate or waive any provision ofthe Mianjiang River EIA, EMP the ECOPs or RAPs without prior written agreement of the Bank | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, A, para 3 (b) | Description :PIA will furnish to the Bank for approval a prospectiveanual work and budget plan for the project by Dec. 15 each year, starting with Dec. 2014 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, C, para 1 | Description :Take all measures to minimize resettlement and where landacquisition or displacement is unavoidable, before initiating works requiring acquisition/resettlement, cause project participantto implement corresponding RAP | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, C, para 3 | Description :Maintain policies and procedures to enable M&E of safeguardsand prepare and furnish semi-annual reports, due Feb 15 & August 15, starting Feb. 15, 2014 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, C, para 4 | Description :No later than Dec 15 starting 2013, furnish a draft annual damsafety action plan for the Shankouyan and Qiaolin dams | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section II, A, para 2 | Description :PIE shall provide the Bank for review and comment with a Midterm review report and thereafter, implement agreed actions based on conclusions of review | Due Date :01-Mar-2016
Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section II, B, para 3 | Description :Borrower shall submit audited financial statements within 6months after the end of the period audited | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement (PA) Schedule, Section I, A. para 3 (a) | Description :PIA will furnish to the Bank forapproval the initial work and budget plan covering the first 18 months of implementation | Due Date :15-Jul-2013
